item.title: England face Ashes battle despite Gabba fightback
item.description: England produce a floodlit fightback late on the second day of the second Test against Australia but still face a huge battle to stay alive in the Ash...

item.title: Residents remain out of 200 homes in major incident
item.description: Two people were arrested on Thursday before 200 homes were evacuated.

item.title: Netflix reportedly closes in on Warner Bros deal
item.description: The streaming giant has emerged as the top bidder ahead of rivals Comcast and Paramount Skydance, reports say.

item.title: 'As good as I've ever seen' - where does Jacks' catch rank?
item.description: England all-rounder Will Jacks takes a stunning catch to remove stand-in Australia captain Steve Smith on day two in Brisbane - and it gets big praise...

item.title: Alleged associate of synagogue attacker in court
item.description: Mohammad Asim Bashir is accused of driving Jihad Al-Shamie to UK Defence Academy before the attack.
